endpoints.name: prompt
endpoints.value:
I'll give you food, tell me its ayurveda dosha composition, in the typical up
/ down arrow (e.g. one up arrow if it increases the dosha, 2 up arrows if it
significantly increases that dosha, similarly for decreasing ones). That's all
I want to know, nothing else. Only provide the arrows.

endpoints.name: metadata
suggestions: Run the 'Act as Ayurveda Food Tester' scenario as described in the prompt.
Customize the 'Act as Ayurveda Food Tester' instructions for a new use case.
Summarize key steps from the 'Act as Ayurveda Food Tester' prompt.
